post.body: - and i'm going to cook gina and pats twice baked sweet potatoes! Oh, and yeah coat and boots for the cold attic
-GIRL!! you're feelin me! Okay, so i'm going to do my infamous baked turkey legs with gravy instead!
- Yes, I done it several times! lol
- The vaseline thing is here in michigan to!! Freezing weather!
- LOL..say it girl!
- yay, I can make this one! Do you have the link to sign up for it? What time, 8 eastern right?
- yaayy! Isn't it a great feeling when you can take your time doing everything b/c you know there's no work the next day!
- LOL! That is to funny...I'll let you know!
- u have NO idea how excited I am! Do u have any extra days off? p.s. I saw a long box under the tree (i think it's the guitar!)
- That's great!!
- I thought of the capt. when I first asked you about the music, lol, I know he is our "DJ"
: Musiq has a new one out that I hear is like his first record...I love musiq, might have to get that to!
: So far I really like KC & AH, I was thinking JF would be to "clubby" but maybe i'll check it out..
Oh boy...I might have to cook a turkey for the first time this year...yikes! on to the food network site...mr & mrs mcneely I need u! lol
Morning Tweets! Deliveries this week: S-T-D magnets, seating chart, placecards,table signs, february wedding invites, sweet 16 proofs
One more day of work tomorrow then i'm on VACATION from the "place"...ssooo excited!!
Just finished my bride's seating chart...now I need to track down delayed packages from UPS, I need my materials!! Darn weather..
The christmas potluck was great! Extremely late night=Extremely late morning
Busy, busy cleaning house and decorating for my christmas party tonight with my peeps from work...we have so much fun at our monthly outings
Off to dinner at olive garden then to see 7 pounds, with the hubby...Have a wonderful night tweets..stay warm!
